nodes.text: The Sal-Solo mansion was a squarish stone building built to military standards located on Corellia. It was surrounded by a trench of water, and was only accessible through a narrow wooden bridge that crossed the trench. Surrounding the structure was a high stone wall made of the same stone, as well trees and ornamental bushes.
Tiion Sal-Solo and her son Thrackan had once inhabited the mansion.
